properties.name: FastCraft
properties.description: FastCraft is a sophisticated mod which improves the client and server performance significantly without any game play changes. FastCraft is useful for anything, even fast PCs and servers benefit.

properties.name: LLOverlayReloaded
properties.description:
Toggle a light-level spawn overlay when you press F7. Similar to NEI's version, but more compatible.

See https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/226670-light-level-overlay-reloaded

properties.name: Xaero's Minimap (Reign version)
properties.description: A modified version of Xaero's Minimap that only unlocks once you posess a specific item (lore-friendly).

properties.name: Ambiotic
properties.description:
MAtmos-inspired ambient sound engine. WARNING: In our testing this has caused occasional crashes. YMMV.

NOTE: You CPU will take a bit of a hit (may reduce FPS).

properties.name: Dynamic Surroundings
properties.description: Audio and visual immersion/enhancement mod. Lots of cool effects.

properties.name: Sound Filters
properties.description:
Adds sound reverb to caves and a muted effect to sound when behind walls and underwater.

NOTE: You CPU will take a bit of a hit (may reduce FPS).

properties.name: Neat (Reign version)
properties.description: Shows nameplates and health bars above other creatures. Preconfigured to only show for the creature you're looking at, and doesn't stay visible in darkness. Immersive!
